name: Megatokyo - Minimalistic
description:
Just the comic and rants (with option to hide those too)
The preview is a bit messed up since the auto feature takes them at a low resolution.
So if you're not on a widescreen monitor at 1600x900 or higher res you probably want to disable the rants.
I might make an option to keep the rants at their original locations... maybe... if I feel like it.
